item.title: Importing a custom namespace / custom type into an XSD
item.description: How to save and import a custom type into an XML Schema Document (XSD).

item.title: XML Schema Definition creation: Journal - Part 2: XSD file with <oXygen/> XML Editor
item.description: In part 2 of a new series, I cover how I created a new XML Schema Definition for journal-like XML files. This time we work with oXygen XML Editor to graphically create the XSD.

item.title: XML Schema Definition creation: Journal - Part 1: Primary layout
item.description: In part 1 of a new series, I cover how I created a new XML Schema Definition for journal-like XML files.
